original_title: Anura wins Nuwara Eliya District postal votes
original_body_lines: The postal vote result of the Nuwara Eliya District in the 2024 Presidential Election has been released by the Election Commission.
National People’s Power (NPP) candidate Anura Kumara Dissanayake has received the highest number of postal votes in the district with a total of 8,946 votes.
